hero.title: Welcome to BASE
hero.subtitle: The streetfood bar at the Groest in Hilversum - Opening soon!
hero.description: with the moving of Monsees to 's-Graveland, it's time for something new. BASE is a new streetfood bar located at the Biersteeg in Hilversum. The best cocktails paired with the best streetfood.

seo.title: BASE Restaurant - Home
seo.description: Welcome to BASE Restaurant in Hilversum. Enjoy our streetfood and exclusive cocktails in an atmospheric environment.
